nodes.text: A deactivated G0-T0 infrastructure planning system said to have been recovered from the asteroid field left behind by the destroyed planet Malachor V was on display in the Museum Republica in the Axial Park district of the planet Corellia's capital, Coronet City. The infrastructure planning system and crime boss known as G0-T0 was present on Malachor V during its destruction in 3951 BBY, but like many objects in the museum, the actual validity of the item was questionable.
